actions.name: AcceptAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to accept an AWS agreement that has not yet been accepted by the customer account

actions.name: AcceptNdaForAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to accept the terms of an NDA Document for a given agreement resource

actions.name: DownloadAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to download an AWS agreement that has not yet been accepted or a customer agreement that has been accepted by the customer account

actions.name: Get
actions.description: Grants permission to download an AWS compliance report package

actions.name: GetAccountSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to get the account settings for Artifact

actions.name: GetAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS agreement that has not yet been accepted by the customer account

actions.name: GetCustomerAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS agreement that has been accepted by the customer account

actions.name: GetNdaForAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the NDA Document for a given agreement resource

actions.name: GetReport
actions.description: Grants permission to download a report

actions.name: GetReportMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to download metadata associated with a report

actions.name: GetTermForReport
actions.description: Grants permission to download a term associated with a report

actions.name: ListAgreements
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS agreements

actions.name: ListCustomerAgreements
actions.description: Grants permission to list customer-agreement resources that have been accepted by the customer account

actions.name: ListReports
actions.description: Grants permission to list reports in your account

actions.name: PutAccountSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to put account settings for Artifact

actions.name: TerminateAgreement
actions.description: Grants permission to terminate a customer agreement that was previously accepted by the customer account
